overview: March came, with it came birds, the sun, the first petals of flowers, the buds of treesâ€¦ but people disappeared from the streets, squares. Overnight, there were empty cafes, shops, shopping malls, churches, mosques, classrooms, stations, railways, roads ... There was silence and silence that is sometimes broken by the singing of birds, the barking of dogs, the buzzing of flies, and the sound of ambulances!
title: Zatvoreno
